content: Happy Pizza Day All!A celebration of said day and my way of saying Thanks, again. Â Winner will receive items as pictured. Â Don't be afraid to merit. Â Free shipping to US address, if international address, will ship to minerjones and you must arrange reshipping with him. Â No new accounts created today and afterwards qualify for this entry. Please no alts that will result in multiple entries. Â How this will work:Pick a table and a slot. Â I will select a block and last character will select the table. Â If last character doesn't result in a table selection, then block(s) will be selected until so.
